## This session

In this session, you will complete the following tasks:

1. Read the [chapter "Command Line"](https://lennartwittkuhn.com/version-control-book/chapters/command-line.html) of the Version Control Book.
1. Try out the commands in the chapter and play around with them.
1. Complete the exercises in the [Command Line quiz](https://version-control-cli.formr.org).
1. Check whether you have achieved the [learning objectives](#learning-objectives).

At the end of this session, you should have a folder called "recipes" with a file called "recipes.txt" in it.
